This is just some stuff I want to remember

Obligatory intro post

24 Oct 2012

I’ve had this page layout for some time, and I just bought a domain. I think it’s time to put this to good use.

The primary purpose is my record-keeping, note-taking, and bragging. If something is useful to you, awesome. If nothing is useful to you, well I don’t have anything to say.

There are some things I should note and people I should thank.
